description.en: Different stages in planning and conducting of academic research, potential problems. Analysis of students' research.
description.et: Kursusel käsitletakse uurimistöö meetodeid, töö erinevaid etappe ja võimalikke ettetulevaid probleeme. Seminarides analüüsitakse konkreetseid teostatavaid seminaritöid.

objectives.en: To give an overview of the main stages of conducting research and prepare the students for writing course and final papers.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade uurimistöö tegemise ja kirjutamise peamistest etappidest ja valmistada üliõpilane ette seminaritöö kirjutamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: The student is able to plan a research project, is aware of different stages in conducting the research, different research methods with their possibilities and limitations, assesses the quality of previous research. Is able to carry out a research project with a support from the supervisor.
